---
<p>Paper Bag is a short autobiographical film about the furry condition, by French film-maker Jean-Baptiste Gaudet (also known as <a href="http://www.furaffinity.net/user/pandamanp.f.i./">Panda Man on FA</a>).</p>
<p>It's a terrific and startling short film, one that treats furry as an idea, rather than as a genre. Just the way we like it here at [a][s]. Enjoy.</p>
<p><iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/g_eeNM_xQ0A" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></p>
<p>For all you furry francophones, there is a version without subtitles:</p>
<p></p>
<!--more-->
<p><iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/jDhOEbuWzrM" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></p>
